field.comment: How often do you want to check it? The least amount is 30s.
field.name: pollInterval

field.comment: What is the maximum amount of time a call can take before we consider it problematic. If not filled in, any duration is ok
field.name: callDurationThreshold

field.comment: You can add an additional script that will check for some particular eventuality (e.g. parse xml and check a value). Should return "true" or "false" indicating success or failure.
field.name: validationScript

field.comment: When did we check last? Useful for seeing which ones need to be rechecked
field.name: lastChecked

field.comment: Whether or not it is enabled
field.name: enabled
